statements: SELECT * FROM alarms_and_alerts;
SELECT id, device_id, alarm_type, alert_msg, created_at FROM alarms_and_alerts WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT id, device_id, alarm_type FROM alarms_and_alerts WHERE id BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT alarm_type, created_at, device_id FROM alarms_and_alerts WHERE alert_msg LIKE '%error%';
SELECT device_id, created_at, alarm_type FROM alarms_and_alerts ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM alarms_and_alerts ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT alarm_type, alert_msg FROM alarms_and_alerts WHERE device_id = 101 ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT id, alarm_type FROM alarms_and_alerts WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01' AND created_at <= '2022-02-01';
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS num_alarms FROM alarms_and_alerts GROUP BY device_id HAVING num_alarms > 2;
SELECT AVG(id) AS avg_id, MAX(created_at) AS max_created_at FROM alarms_and_alerts WHERE alarm_type LIKE '%temperature%';
SELECT * FROM alarms;
SELECT alarm_id, alarm_type, alarm_timestamp FROM alarms WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT alarm_id, alarm_type FROM alarms WHERE alarm_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM alarms WHERE alarm_type = 'Critical' ORDER BY alarm_timestamp DESC;
SELECT alarm_id, alarm_description FROM alarms WHERE device_id = 2 ORDER BY alarm_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM alarms WHERE alarm_id = 1;
SELECT alarm_type, alarm_description FROM alarms WHERE device_id = 5 ORDER BY alarm_timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT device_id, COUNT(alarm_id) AS alarms_count FROM alarms GROUP BY device_id HAVING COUNT(alarm_id) > 2;
SELECT alarms.alarm_id, alarms.alarm_type, alerts.alert_level, alerts.alert_message FROM alarms JOIN alerts ON alarms.alarm_id = alerts.alarm_id;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(alarm_id) AS total_alarms, AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM NOW() - alarm_timestamp)) AS avg_age_seconds FROM alarms GROUP BY device_id ORDER BY total_alarms DESC;
SELECT * FROM Alarms;
SELECT alarm_id, alarm_type FROM Alarms WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT alarm_message, timestamp FROM Alarms ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT incident_id, alarm_id, alert_id, severity FROM Incidents WHERE severity = 'High';
SELECT device_id, alert_type, alert_description FROM Alerts WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Alarms ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT alarm_id, device_id, alarm_type FROM Alarms WHERE device_id = 1001;
SELECT incident_id, severity, description FROM Incidents WHERE severity = 'High';
SELECT * FROM Alerts WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT incident_id, alarm_id, alert_id, severity, description FROM Incidents ORDER BY incident_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM alarms ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT alarm_id, device_id, alarm_type FROM alarms WHERE device_id = 3;
SELECT description, created_at FROM alarms WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE severity > 3 ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM alarms ORDER BY created_at DESC, device_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT incident_type, description FROM incidents WHERE occurred_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY incident_id;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) as num_alarms FROM alarms GROUP BY device_id HAVING num_alarms > 2 ORDER BY num_alarms DESC;

SELECT a.device_id, d.location, COUNT(*) as num_incidents FROM incidents i INNER JOIN alarms a ON i.alarm_id = a.alarm_id INNER JOIN devices d ON a.device_id = d.device_id GROUP BY a.device_id, d.location ORDER BY num_incidents DESC;
SELECT * FROM alarms WHERE alarm_type = 'Critical';
SELECT alarm_id, timestamp, alarm_type FROM alarms WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_id, incident_timestamp, incident_type FROM incidents WHERE device_id = 3 ORDER BY incident_timestamp ASC;
SELECT device_id, log_type, log_message FROM logs WHERE device_id = 2 AND log_type = 'Error';
SELECT * FROM alarms ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT device_id, alarm_type, alarm_message FROM alarms WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'warning' ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, description FROM incidents WHERE device_id = 2 ORDER BY incident_timestamp ASC;
